alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 1:29AM MDT until August 13 at 1:45AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OGLALA LAKOTA AND EAST CENTRAL FALL RIVER COUNTIES... At 129 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Slim Butte, or 18 miles north of Chadron, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Slim Butte and Slim Buttes Housing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
